name: Toyota
shortDescription: The Toyota Glanza has 1 Petrol Engine and 1 CNG Engine on offer. The Petrol engine is 1197 cc while the CNG engine is 1197 cc. It is available with Manual & Automatic transmission. Depending upon the variant and fuel type the Glanza has a mileage of 22.35 kmpl to 30.61 km/kg. The Glanza is a 5 seater 4 cylinder car and has a length of 3990mm, width of 1745, and a wheelbase of 2520.

name: Ford
shortDescription: The Ford EcoSport has 1 Diesel Engine and 1 Petrol Engine on offer. The Diesel engine is 1498 cc while the Petrol engine is 1496 cc. It is available with Manual & Automatic transmission. Depending upon the variant and fuel type the EcoSport has a mileage of 14.7 to 21.7 kmpl. The EcoSport is a 5 seater 4 cylinder car and has a length of 3998, width of 1765, and a wheelbase of 2519.

name: BMW
shortDescription: The BMW 8 Series is a range of grand tourer coupes and convertibles produced by BMW. The 8 Series was introduced in 1990 under the E31 model code and was only available as a two-door coup√©. It is powered by a range of naturally aspirated V8 and V12 petrol engines.

name: Mercedes-Benz
shortDescription: The 2-door model will replace the C- and E-Class coupe and cabriolet with a muscular design, contemporary interior appointments and an extended range of electrified drivetrains. Mercedes-Benz officially confirms the CLE name for the upcoming successor to its existing C- and E-Class coupe and cabriolet models.

name: Tesla
shortDescription: A complete overview of the Tesla Model 3 specs and dimensions. Find out about its size, boot space, equipment, and more.

name: Honda
shortDescription: Engine Specification. Power. 136 kW ; Engine Configuration. Displacement. 2,354 cc / 2.4 l ; General. Fuel. Petrol ; Fuel Consumption NEDC. City. 10.7 l/100km.
